ygData.subject: Re: O'Reilly have just published my REST article
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Nic! Enjoyed your article.  One comment, Safari s XHR implementation is a little bit broken, PUT and DELETE requests are silently converted to GETs. Cheers

Hi Nic!

Enjoyed your article.  One comment, Safari's XHR implementation is=
 a little bit broken, PUT 
and DELETE requests are silently converted to GE=
Ts.

Cheers
Adam
